The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 04 August is 264,219 (469.4 cases per 100,000 population). In the seven days to 31 July, there were 4,865 new confirmed cases (8.6 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 24 July, there were 4,502 new cases and so the new cases have risen by 8% (363 extra cases).
